data.text: @OhMG1992 Hi there 👋. Unfortunately we are unable to take payments in this platform. To add a bag on your booking, please contact our Customer Services team on +44 (0) 330 5515151. Here is a link to the rest of our service numbers ➡️: https://t.co/NuMrcFtIOa ☎️. Thanks, Axola ✈️
